name: Type A Wooden Ladder 3+3 Steps
shortDescription: 3+3 step ladder made from Kiln-Dried Beech Wood, suitable for double-sided use
description: This ladder, made from natural and quality Kiln-Dried Beech Wood, has both durable and aesthetic appearance. It provides safe and comfortable use in homes and workplaces. It offers long-lasting use with its sturdy structure reinforced with hidden dowels and wood glue, strengthened with long bolt screws from four separate points.
features: Durable Material: Long-lasting use with Kiln-Dried Beech Wood
Safe Use: Stable and safe thanks to double exit design
Easy Access: Comfortable use even in narrow spaces with 3+3 step structure
Sturdy Structure: Reinforced with hidden dowels and wood glue
Prevents Separation: Steps are connected to each other with chains
Portable: Easy to open and close
Double-Sided Use: Double-sided exit capability
Non-Conductive: Safe use
